articles.title: Splatoon 3’s newest update accidentally includes balance changes meant for a future patch - Nintendo Everything
articles.description: Splatoon received a version 11.0.1 update just a few days ago, fixing a couple issues with the game’s controls and multiplayer. As it turns out, Nintendo revealed that a couple of weapon balance changes were accidentally thrown into the update as well. Ninten…
